description:
My place is close to Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum, Central Park. You’ll love my place because of the location.

Upper East side is a fantastic location, lost of restaurants, bars, and cafes. Few blocks from Central Park and main city attractions. Easy going community and quite building.

Metro Line 6 and buses M96 and M86 to go east to west. Parking lots in proximity to my building average cost per day around 35 USD. Off-street parking is allowed but look for signs and regulations they are strictly enforced in NYC avoid getting a ticket and ride the public transportation.
name: Studio with perfect location
review: The place was nice and cozy for 2 people. The location is great with easy access to subway stations.. and lots of great restaurants around! Thanks Carlos.
